title: Strengthening Instructional Design Practice Competencies: Digital Escape Room-Based Language Education Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic game mechanics understanding and language education design experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can design digital escape game scenarios to enhance language proficiency by applying game-based learning principles.
Learners can develop prototypes that evaluate the balance between educational effectiveness and game elements using design-based research (DBR) methodology.
Learners can create practical educational content using digital escape game authoring tools (e.g., quiz-based platforms, AR quizzes) executable in smartphone environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
